hero.title: PocketPro
hero.subtitle: Automated Contracts + Payment Processing + Free Brokerage Services, Focus on Market Expansion

painPoints.title: Wasting Time on Project Administration?
painPoints.subtitle: We understand the challenges you face in managing projects

point1.title: Chasing Signatures on Contracts & Labor Reports All Day
point1.description: Contracts, payments, and labor reports need to be handled one by one. A single event involves 5-10 collaborators with dozens of documents to track down

point2.title: Tax Risks & Time to Find Talent
point2.description: Second generation health insurance, withholding certificates, and invoicing are error-prone. Many market options but hard to find qualified people quickly

point3.title: External Payroll Calculation is Troublesome
point3.description: Second generation health insurance, withholding calculation changes yearly. Sending wrong amounts creates follow-up headaches with accounting

solutions.title: Solve Pain Points
solutions.subtitle: Three core features to break free from complex administration

solution1.title: Automated Contract Generation
solution1.description: Automated contract generation and signing saves significant back-and-forth time

solution2.title: One Invoice Solves Everything
solution2.description: Integrate payment systems to simplify invoicing and payment workflows
solution2.feature2: One invoice handles the entire project

solution3.title: Outsourced Labor Services
solution3.description: Automatically calculate payroll and taxes, ensuring compliance and accuracy

workflow.title: Fragmented Execution Process
workflow.subtitle: Complete everything in one place from finding talent to tax filing

feature1.title: Monthly Talent List for Clients
feature1.details: AI crawler provides 50+ uncommunicated creator lists with basic information and links, letting brands select and proactively negotiate partnerships

feature2.title: Contract Signing & Service Execution
feature2.step1: Clients fill out job requirement forms

targetAudience.title: Who Should Use PocketPro?
targetAudience.subtitle: PocketPro is designed for businesses that need to efficiently manage creators and partners

audience1.title: Consulting & Brokerage Firms
audience1.description: Manage multiple external collaborators, need quick contract signing and fee settlement
audience1.benefit1: Quickly establish cooperation contracts (9A tax scope)

audience2.title: Integrated Marketing Companies
audience2.description: Execute multi-channel marketing campaigns, coordinate many creators and partners

audience3.title: Brand Marketing Teams
audience3.description: Brand internal marketing teams need to collaborate with external creators and agencies

brands.title: Trusted by Leading Brands
